page.title: 03GRAVEL PITS
page.content: Thorpe on the Hill has several{gravel {pits}that have been proposed for refuse tips. Leaflets have been distributed in the village warning and asking villagers to take action against it. Most people are against the proposal because the filling of the pits could take as long as eight years to be completed.Another complaint is that more traffic would travel through the village possibly as many as two hundred heavy goods vehicles a day and an increasing amount of private vehicles at weekends.Another cause for complaint is the unhygienic conditions it would create for the villagers. {So the pits future is {debatable!
